>> a = [0.299,0.587,0.114;-0.169,-0.331,0.5;0.5,-0.419,-0.081]

a =

    0.2990    0.5870    0.1140
   -0.1690   -0.3310    0.5000
    0.5000   -0.4190   -0.0810

>> inv(a)

ans =

    1.0000   -0.0009    1.4017
    1.0000   -0.3437   -0.7142
    1.0000    1.7722    0.0010

   -0.1146   -0.3854    0.5000
